alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 5:18PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Colbert, northeastern Franklin and northwestern Lawrence Counties through 545 PM CST... At 518 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Russellville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Russellville, Town Creek, Littleville, Leighton, Hatton, La Grange, Tharptown, Isbell, Ne Smith and Whiteoak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for northwestern Alabama.
